ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: 3 50+ active bards: Me, just made 54.  Suladan 55 still plays his bard pretty much.  Kaldivar 53 not really enjoying high level life (hard to get good groups,
ygData.messageBody:
3 50+ active bards: Me, just made 54. Suladan 55 still plays his bard
pretty much. Kaldivar 53 not really enjoying high level life (hard to get
good groups, exp so slow, etc. etc.) so he has been leveling up a warrior
and playing other classes.

Lately, I have been playing 52 Cleric and 51 Enchanter. Learning these
other classes is more interesting to me at the moment. Also, I have 2 PC's
now and spend a fair amount of time driving 2 chars.

Sylly

> Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in your guilds?
